summary: This is an email exchange between FBI personnel regarding the Jeffrey Epstein hotline notes. The email forwards notes filled out by Detective Harkins after Epstein's arrest, with a request to receive any new notes on a rolling basis.

persons.name: Walter Harkins
persons.context: Detective Harkins filled out notes for the Jeffrey Epstein hotline after Epstein's arrest, as referenced in the email.

events.title: Epstein's Arrest
events.description: Reference to Jeffrey Epstein's arrest, which prompted Detective Harkins to fill out hotline notes.

keyFacts: The document is an email exchange regarding Jeffrey Epstein hotline notes.
Detective Walter Harkins filled out notes for the hotline after Epstein's arrest.
The FBI requested to receive any new hotline notes on a rolling basis.
